statements: DELETE FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE years_in_current_position > 5 AND current_position = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE employee_id = 101 AND current_position = 'Manager';
DELETE FROM Leadership_Succession_Planning WHERE years_in_current_position > 5 AND potential_successor IS NOT NULL;
DELETE FROM Successor_Eligibility WHERE age > 40 AND readiness_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM SuccessionHistory WHERE employee_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM SuccessorProfile WHERE age < 30 AND skills LIKE '%leadership%';
